properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWnUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT N.NOTI_NO , N.TITLE , N.ENROLL_DATE , M.MEM_ID , NOTI_VIEWS FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEM_NO = N.MEM_NO) WHERE NOTI_TYPE = '고객센터' OR NOTI_TYPE = '1' ORDER BY NOTI_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT N.TITLE , M.MEM_ID , N.CONTENT , N.ENROLL_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON(N.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE NOTI_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWnUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MTM_NO , T.MEM_NO , MEM_NO2 , MTM_TITLE , T.ENROLL_DATE , MTM_TYPE , ANS_YN , M.MEM_ID FROM MTM T LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (T.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) ORDER BY MTM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT MTM_TITLE , M.MEM_ID , MTM_CONTENT FROM MTM T JOIN MEMBER M ON(T.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE MTM_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT F.FAQ_NO , C.CATEGORY_NAME , F.FAQ_TITLE , F.ENROLL_DATE , F.COUNT FROM FAQ F LEFT JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY C ON (F.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE FAQ SET COUNT = COUNT+1 WHERE FAQ_NO = ? AND FAQ_YN = 'Y'

SELECT F.FAQ_NO , M.MEM_ID , C.CATEGORY_NAME , F.ENROLL_DATE , F.MODIFY_DATE , F.COUNT , F.FAQ_TITLE , F.FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ F LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON(F.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN FAQ_CATEGORY C ON (F.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
INSERT INTO FAQ ( FAQ_NO , MEM_NO , CATEGORY_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , COUNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_FAQ.NEXTVAL , 1 , ? , ? , ? , CURRENT_DATE , 0)
UPDATE MTM SET MEM_NO2 = ? , ANS_CONTENT = ? , ANS_YN = 'Y' WHERE MTM_NO = ?
